data.text:
The Job Search Field: A Lacrosse Match Analogy Searching for a job can be likened to the fast-paced, strategic game of lacrosse. Here's how the two compare: The Face-Off: Starting Your Job Search In lacrosse, the game begins with a face-off, and in job searching, it starts with you stepping onto the field—sending out resumes and connecting with potential employers. It's a moment of anticipation, where strategy and quick reflexes are key. Cradling: Keeping Your Options Open. Cradling in lacrosse allows players to maintain possession of the ball while on the move. Similarly, in job searching, you cradle your opportunities, keeping your options open and your prospects secure as you navigate through the job market. Dodging: Navigating the Job Market A player dodges to evade opponents and advance towards the goal. In job searching, you dodge through obstacles such as competitive job markets and evolving industry demands, aiming to find that opening which leads to a career breakthrough. The Long Stick: Extending Your Reach In lacrosse, the long stick is used to extend a player's reach. When job hunting, you extend your reach through networking, leveraging online platforms like LinkedIn, and attending industry events to connect with influencers and decision-makers. Scoring: Landing the Job. Scoring a goal is the ultimate aim in lacrosse, just as landing a job is in your search. It's a moment of success that comes from preparation, teamwork, and seizing the right opportunity at the right moment. Defense: Handling Rejections. A good defense is crucial in lacrosse to protect the team's lead. In job searching, you'll need to defend against rejections and setbacks, learning from them and coming back stronger, ready for the next opportunity. The Clock: Time Management Lacrosse is a timed game, and managing the clock is essential. In job searching, managing your time effectively—balancing applications, interviews, and follow-ups—is just as crucial to ensure you don't miss out on potential opportunities. Whether you're a seasoned professional or a newcomer to the job market, approaching your job search with the same strategic mindset as a lacrosse player can lead to rewarding opportunities. Keep your goal in sight, stay agile, and push forward with determination. Good luck on your job search journey! Vensure Employer Solutions Solvo Global Philip Urso Christian Chain Danna Sofía García Osorio Michael Urso Travis Bruyere PROFESSIONAL LACROSSE PLAYERS ASSOC Brian Urso Shane Brummond Stephen Hanselman William Kane Carmen Ocasio, MBA Women's Professional Lacrosse League (WPLL) #lacrosse #businessandsports #competition

I know that many industry professionals got some shocking news last week and were let go. If any of my #UKG friends were affected by the recent layoffs I would be happy to help you find a new home. @Vensure Employer Solutions is in hyper growth and hiring top talent in the HCM space. My team and I could maybe find you a new home right away. There are also many new positions that will also be available in the second half of this year, so reach out to me when you’re ready to discuss. If I can assist you and/or make an introduction within my network, don't hesitate to message me at walter.sabrin@vensure.com Vensure Employer Solutions Philip Urso Kevin Andrews Rich DeGuzman Rick Torrence John Dnyprowsky Emily Gluzov, MBA Christian Chain Stephen Hanselman #ukglayoffs, #ultimatesoftware #hcm

As we kick off the second half of 2024, staffing companies face critical challenges in workers' compensation, payroll, and HR compliance. Summer often brings increased temporary hiring, making it crucial to have your systems in place. Key areas to focus on: Workers' Compensation: Ensure proper coverage for seasonal workers to avoid costly claims and legal issues. Payroll: Streamline processes to handle fluctuations in staffing levels and ensure timely, accurate payments. HR Compliance: Stay up-to-date on ever-changing regulations, especially those impacting temporary and seasonal workers. VensureHR Staffing Alliance can be your strategic partner. We provide comprehensive solutions to simplify these complex areas, allowing you to focus on your core business. Our expertise in workers' comp, payroll, and HR can help you mitigate risks, reduce administrative burdens, and ensure compliance. Ready to learn more about how VensureHR Staffing Alliance can support your staffing company's success? Connect with me to explore our tailored solutions. #staffing #HR #payroll #workerscompensation #riskmanagement #compliance #VensureHR American Staffing Association Vensure Employer Solutions Brian Urso Matt Kaplan John Gaudiuso
